Headline: India's growth outlook for FY26 remains strong, says Finance Ministry
Summary: India's growth outlook remains robust driven by domestic demand, good monsoon, easing inflation, and GST rate cuts with upgraded forecasts to 6.6-6.8%.

Summary: Indian automakers are expected to see earnings recovery after five quarters of slow growth amid improving demand conditions.

Summary: India maintains its position as the world's fastest-growing major economy despite facing international tariff pressures.
